name: Diskus
description: Is one of the inhalers that can treate Cronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease(COPD). Diskus is circle-shaped and has a locking mechanism which can be opened using the thumb.

name: Turbuhaler
description: Is one of the inhalers that is drum-shaped and can be inserted with powdered medicine inside. This inhaler is used by sucking the medicine using your mouth, then inhaling it to your lungs.

name: Respimat
description: Is one of the inhalers that is used as a therapy for COPD care including bronchitis, emphysema, disorders associated with dyspnea, and to prevent exacerbations. This inhaler is shaped like a drum with a button lock.

name: pMDI
description: Is an inhaler with a certain dosage that provides a dose of the active substance in each puff. MDI consists of suspension and dispersion of one or more active substances in the propellant or propellant and solvent mix. pMDI is a type of MDI that works based on the pressurized propellant in the aerosol chamber.

name: Breezhaler
description: Is normally used as a treatment for COPD patiens such as Onbrez indacaterol), Seebri (glycopyrronium), and Ultibro (glycopyrronium plus indacaterol). Breezhaler is indicated as once-per-day bronchodilator treatment to relieve the patient's symptoms with Cronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease(COPD).
